name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Control Incident
description: This playbook responds to an attacker establishing command and control communication over HTTP/S, with actions to kill processes, block malicious IPs, scan for threats, review logs, and notify the security team.

action--b9f3c8c0-a09b-4f59-a1b9-1f83c790.name: Kill malicious process
action--b9f3c8c0-a09b-4f59-a1b9-1f83c790.description: Terminate the malicious process that might be used for command and control.

action--ac5e2c3d-99a4-4c2e-b9bb-f6cacc0e.name: Check and block the malicious IP
action--ac5e2c3d-99a4-4c2e-b9bb-f6cacc0e.description: Block outbound connections to the identified malicious IP address.

condition--dbf450b3-16b5-4632-979e-54312.name: Run full system scan
condition--dbf450b3-16b5-4632-979e-54312.description: Scan the entire system for potential threats.

threats_detected.description: Indicates if threats were found during the scan

action--dbf450b3-16b5-4632-979e-543126bd.name: Run full system scan
action--dbf450b3-16b5-4632-979e-543126bd.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the system to find any additional threats.

condition--ed66c30e-6b87-4469-aa15-dbe3d.name: Review firewall logs for anomalies
condition--ed66c30e-6b87-4469-aa15-dbe3d.description: Check the firewall logs for any suspicious activity.

suspicious_activity_found.description: Indicates if suspicious activity was detected in the logs

action--a978c5fa-252d-4b6d-88f1-03efa59f.name: Notify security team
action--a978c5fa-252d-4b6d-88f1-03efa59f.description: Alert the security team about the detected suspicious activity.

commands.command: echo 'Suspicious activity detected on host-33' | mail -s 'Alert' security-team@example.com
